messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Medbay.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Diplomatic Corps

Cargo: The Spider Clan has sent us a mysterious gift. Can we ship it to you to see what's inside?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, a pack of wire eating mammals have swarmed into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a number of energy draining parasites have stampeded into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Fuck all y'all. Kill eachother, last one alive becomes CEO of Nanotrasen.

messages.author: Declan Judge (Captain)
messages.photo caption: I spread my legs like the god i am
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Spread eagling like the god i am</font>

messages.author: Tyron Jamal (Assistant)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">AFTER TWO WHOLE POSTS FROM DECLEN THE CAPTAIN HE HAS MADE HIMSELF A PUBLIC DESGRACE, THUS THE SHOULD MUTENY TO AVOID BEING GAY</font>

comments.author: Beau Richards (Cargo Technician)
comments.body: thats sexy when its on a different news station
